Name: Cedric Maxwell
Note: Also served as broadcaster (2001–present); briefly wore No. 30 in 1977–78.

Name: Reggie Lewis
Note: Died of a heart attack while still playing for the team; number retired posthumously.

Name: Jim Loscutoff
Note: Wore No. 18 but decided to keep it active; number ultimately retired for Dave Cowens.

Name: Dražen Petrović
Note: Died in a car crash while playing for the team; with the team when it was known as the New Jersey Nets. His jersey was retired posthumously.

Name: Wendell Ladner
Note: Died in a plane crash; with the team when it was on Long Island as the New York Nets. His jersey was retired posthumously; however no banner is currently raised at the Barclays Center.

Name: Jason Kidd
Note: The team was then the New Jersey Nets.Also served as head coach (2013–present).

Name: John Williamson
Note: During his first four seasons (1973–1977), the team was on Long Island and known as the New York Nets.

Name: Bill Melchionni
Note: The team was then on Long Island as the New York Nets.

Name: Julius Erving
Note: The team was then on Long Island as the New York Nets.

Name: Buck Williams
Note: The team was then the New Jersey Nets.

Name: Michael Jordan
Note: Briefly wore No. 45 in 1995 & 12 for one game in 1991 (due to his jersey stolen).
